overview: Aggressive lesbian sex is back with a vengeance in the latest volume of Sweetheart's newest series Lesbians In Charge 2. Beautiful MILF Julia Ann teaches snotty Jay Taylor a lesson after Jay breaks up with Julia's son, Personal trainer Phoenix Marie whips lazy reality t.v. star Maddy O'Reilly into shape, Nicki Hunter exacts revenge on her ex-husband's new girlfriend Presley Hart, and surly business owner Dana DeArmond shows her business partner what happens when someone tries to buy her out of her own company. anger and friction slowly turn to passionate lovemaking as each vignette begins and finishes with a bang!. Written & Directed by Dana Vespoli.
title: Lesbians In Charge 2
